alert.note: Alert for Coastal Brunswick; Coastal New Hanover; Coastal Pender (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued October 30 at 12:26AM EDT until October 30 at 10:00AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TO 10 AM EDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Coastal Pender, Coastal New Hanover and Coastal Brunswick Counties. * WHEN...From 8 AM to 10 AM EDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Low-lying roads and locations along the Intracoastal Waterway and adjacent tidal creeks may observe minor coastal flooding. Check with local officials for any road closures or impacts. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Mercer Pier at Wrightsville Beach MLLW Categories - Minor 6.0 ft, Moderate 8.0 ft, Major 10.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.5 ft, Moderate 3.5 ft, Major 5.5 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 30/09 AM 6.1 1.6 0.5 2 Minor 30/09 PM 4.8 0.3 0.4 2 None 31/10 AM 6.4 1.9 1.0 3-4 Minor 31/10 PM 5.4 0.9 1.2 3 None 01/11 AM 5.9 1.4 0.8 3 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Brunswick; Coastal New Hanover; Coastal Pender
